intro: The v-data-iterator component is used for displaying data, and shares a majority of its functionality with the v-data-table component. Features include sorting, searching, pagination, and selection.

default.heading: Default
default.intro: The v-data-iterator has internal state for both selection and expansion, just like v-data-table. In this example we use the methods isExpanded and expand available on the default slot.

headerfooter.heading: Header and footer
headerfooter.intro: The v-data-iterator has both a header and footer slot for adding extra content.

filter.heading: Filter
filter.intro: Order, filters and pagination can be controlled externally by using the individual props
